welcome_message_body: Welcome to Richmond, where history and modern charm collide to create a unique and vibrant city experience. Explore our historic neighborhoods, beautiful parks, and delicious culinary scene, and immerse yourself in all that Richmond has to offer!

restaurants.name: Moon Rock Cafe
restaurants.description: Moon Rock Cafe is a restaurant located in Richmond.

restaurants.name: Rivers Restaurant
restaurants.description: Rivers Restaurant is a restaurant located in Richmond.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richmond International Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of services for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Richmond International Airport serves as the hub for Delta Airlines and offers a range of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Richmond International Airport primarily serves United Airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dinwiddie County Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A offers gates for domestic flights and features a variety of restaurants and shops.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for international flights and includes duty-free shopping and premium lounges.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
